DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study primarily evaluate implant survival rate Astra Tech Fixture ST place posterior maxilla . A one-stage surgical protocol use implant load four week implant installation ( early loading ) . Marginal bone level , plaque status periimplant mucosa also evaluate . The subject follow three year .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Implant Survival Rate Astra Tech Fixture ST Posterior Maxilla With One-stage Surgery Early Loading
DOC.criteria: Age 18 75 Unilateral bilateral edentulism posterior maxilla , last tooth canine first bicuspid Willing give inform consent Bone height < 5 mm , plan implant area Bone width < 5 mm , plan implant area Previous bone augmentation procedure plan implant area Previous failures endosseous implant Untreated caries and/or periodontal disease residual dentition History presence systemic local disease condition would compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration Systemic corticosteroid medication would compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration Current alcohol drug abuse Unable unwilling return followup visit 3 year
